channel.title: For Those Who are Subbed to My Channel
channel.description:
I apologize for the lack of content. I've been really busy with my education and grinding out 2 more tracks for the album, and other things, so I haven't had much time for the channel, sadly.
But have no fear! On January 25th, I will do an update video that goes over the new features and I'll show you guys some stuff that I made with it.
Videos from then after will be more tips-and-tricks themed, with the occasional "MAKING ___ with LAKE?!?!" kinda thing. I won't do guides(lectures) as often, I'm gonna make them more fun and shorter with more applicable tips with the shenanigan thrown in. Stay tuned on the 25th! :)

item.title: For Those Who are Subbed to My Channel

item.description:
I don’t know. I didn’t even realize it since I never used the bass lake until about a few weeks ago xD I guess most people don’t realize the other way.
